full_summary:
# Learning Services Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* **Title (English):** Learning Services (LS) – One (1) Instructor, Level 3
* **Title (French):** Services d'apprentissage (SA) - Un (1) instructeur, niveau 3
* **Solicitation Number:** W6369-22-X047
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-13 14:00:00
* **Solicitation Status:** Expired

### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking the provision of one (1) Senior Instructor, Level 3 to deliver training for two DND-owned Systems Engineering courses: System Engineering Fundamentals (SEF) and Requirements Engineering Fundamentals (REF). The Instructor will be required to provide training on an as-and-when requested basis.

### Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (CUKTCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
